name: Last strike (Arweny11)
description:
Last strike -

this is a shooter game anology of the popular game Counter Strike Global Offensive

Our interesting mechanics:

- defuse bombs

- Support for different languages such as: Russian, English, Portuguese, Italian

- Matchmaking

- Support for bots

- Death match

- Arms race

- Skins for weapons

- Variety of weapons

- Grenades

- Friends system

And this is only a small part of the last strike game!

Discord game server: https://discord.gg/EfKN4fpY
